subject: using httpuint to test opening another browser window
msgSnippet: We are having problems with using httpunit to test when links open up another browser session.  we were able to get code to work on our help screen pop-up but
messageBody:
We are having problems with using httpunit to test when links open
up another browser session. we were able to get code to work on our
help screen pop-up but other target links.

Since I'm new to this I think I may have missed something, also can
not seem to find any examples of code to use and modify.

Any Assistance would be greatly appreciated.
Thanks Jeff

code example that appears to be working:
public static void goToHelpPage(WebResponse resp)
{
try
{
WebLink link = resp.getLinkWith("Page Help");
if(link != null)
{
// click on the Page Help link
resp = link.click();

// start a new connection using the url
// from the new browser window
WebResponse newResp = HTTPUnitHelper.goPage(resp.getURL
().toString());
// check that we're on the help page
HTTPUnitHelper.doBasicResponseChecking(newResp, HELP_TITLE);
}
}
catch(Exception e)
{
processException(e);
}
}
